New Records: Tyrese Haliburton and Pascal Siakam each scored 25 points, matching the highest individual scores of the game
Key Match Events: The Pacers' 17-2 second quarter run turned a deficit into a significant lead
Haliburton and Mathurin's back-to-back 3-pointers were pivotal in the game
Pre-Game Insights: Golden State was shorthanded without key players like Stephen Curry and Draymond Green
Steve Kerr noted the impact of the Warriors' injuries
Post-Match Reflections: The Pacers extended their win streak to five, the longest of the season
The Warriors struggled with key players missing but showed resilience despite the deficit
Miscellaneous Highlights: Payton Sandfort's performance in another game was mentioned
The Pacers have won five straight games by double-digit margins
